## Data 

```{r}
#| label: preparation
#| warnings: false
#| messages: false
library(tidyverse)

# install.packages("palmerpenguins")
library(palmerpenguins)

## inspect data
penguins

glimpse(penguins)
unique(penguins$species)
```


## Visualization

```{r}
#| label: plot
ggplot(penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm)) +
 geom_point()
```
